title: Wilson's Tales of the Borders and of Scotland, Volume 18
author: Alexander Leighton
snippet: I would stand for hours gazing upon theWhite Craig, the eastern extremity of the Pentland Hills, and wish I wasupon it, until my eyes were suffused with tears.
